Articles.Content:
[Resolved]

I've taken on a 'retriever scrap' contract so I designed a ship that has an advanced grabbing unit on the front. I'm trying to have it grab an MK1 Lander Can, the can is empty, no occupants. I've tried to go straight at it at 1m/s, 4m/s, 10m/s ... etc. It just keeps bouncing off. How am I supposed to do a scrap mission if the grabber doesn't work?

After restarting the game and verifying cache, it works.

Edited April 30, 2015 by rhadamant
Resolved
Speaking of klaw bugs, there's an insane world-destroying bug that Danny2462 discovered from attaching a Kerbal to a klaw, then the Kerbal to another klaw, making a chain of klaw -> Kerbal -> Klaw.
